mapper.sql: DATE, YEAR, MONTH, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, INDEX_TYPE, INDEX_VALUE, MOM, YOY, UNIT_TYPE, RANK_IN_COUNTRY, RANK_IN_PROVINCE, RANK_IN_CITY, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, STATUS, RAMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3
mapper.select:
select index_type indexType,sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalVolume,UNIT_TYPE unitType from tb_sta_total
GROUP BY index_type

select * from ( select PROVINCE,sum(INDEX_VALUE) total, (@i:=@i+1) as row from tb_sta_total,(select @i:=0) as it where INDEX_TYPE='电商整体交易额' and ramark1 = '省级汇总数据'
GROUP BY PROVINCE)t ORDER BY total desc
select * from ( select CITY,sum(INDEX_VALUE) total, (@i:=@i+1) as row from tb_sta_total,(select @i:=0) as it where INDEX_TYPE='电商整体交易额' and ramark1 = '市级汇总数据' GROUP BY CITY)t ORDER BY total desc

SELECT sum(index_value) total,'B2B交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('B2B交易额')
UNION SELECT sum(index_value) total,'网络零售交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('网络零售交易额')
UNION SELECT sum(index_value) total,'大宗商品现货交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('大宗商品现货交易额')
UNION SELECT sum(index_value) total,'服务类交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('服务类交易额')

SELECT sum(index_value) total,'跨境电商出口额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('跨境电商出口额')
UNION SELECT sum(index_value) total,'跨境电商进口额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('跨境电商进口额')

SELECT sum(index_value) total,'实物商品网购交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('实物商品网购交易额')
UNION SELECT sum(index_value) total,'服务网购交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('服务网购交易额')

SELECT sum(index_value) total,'农村电商交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('农村电商交易额')
UNION SELECT sum(index_value) total,'城市电商交易额' type from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE in ('城市电商交易额')

select * from (select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalVolume,city from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by city) t1
left join ( select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalCount,city from tb_sta_total where INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by city) t2 on t1.city=t2.city

select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalVolume,date dateStr,city from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and city!='全省' group by date,city

select * from (select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalVolume,date dateStr from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by date ORDER BY date asc) t1
left join ( select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalCount,date dateStr2 from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by date ORDER BY date asc) t2 on t1.dateStr = t2.dateStr2

select * from (select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalVolume,sum(mom) totalMum,date_format(DATE,'%Y-%m') dateStr from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by date ORDER BY date asc) t1
left join (select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalCount,sum(mom) totalCountMum,date_format(DATE,'%Y-%m') dateStr2 from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by date ORDER BY date asc) t2 on t1.dateStr = t2.dateStr2
limit #{pageRow},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from ( select date dateStr from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by date ORDER BY date asc) t1
left join (select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalCount,sum(mom) totalCountMum,date dateStr2 from tb_sta_total
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{indexType2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by date ORDER BY date asc) t2 on t1.dateStr = t2.dateStr2

select
from tb_sta_total

select sum(INDEX_VALUE) totalVolume,CITY from tb_sta_total where index_type = '电商整体交易额'
group by CITY ORDER BY totalVolume desc

select t1.PROVINCE,t1.city,t1.qys,t2.cyrs from (SELECT PROVINCE,city,sum(index_value) qys from tb_sta_total where index_type = '企业数'
GROUP BY PROVINCE,city) t1 left JOIN ( SELECT PROVINCE,city,sum(index_value) cyrs from tb_sta_total where index_type = '从业人数'
GROUP BY PROVINCE,city) t2 on t1.city = t2.city and t1.PROVINCE=t2.PROVINCE

select count(1) from ( SELECT date dateStr,PROVINCE,city from tb_sta_total where index_type = '电子商务企业数'
GROUP BY date,PROVINCE,city )t

sql.if: AND INDEX_TYPE in ('电子商务企业数','电子商务从业人数')

mapper.insert: insert into tb_sta_total (ID, DATE, YEAR, MONTH, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, INDEX_TYPE, INDEX_VALUE, MOM, YOY, UNIT_TYPE, RANK_IN_COUNTRY, RANK_IN_PROVINCE, RANK_IN_CITY, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, STATUS, RAMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexValue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{mom,jdbcType=REAL}, #{yoy,jdbcType=REAL}, #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankInCountry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankInProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankInCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ramark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_sta_total
ID,
DATE,
YEAR,
MONTH,
COUNTRY,
PROVINCE,
CITY,
DISTRICT,
INDEX_TYPE,
INDEX_VALUE,
MOM,
YOY,
UNIT_TYPE,
RANK_IN_COUNTRY,
RANK_IN_PROVINCE,
RANK_IN_CITY,
INSERT_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_USER,
STATUS,
RAMARK1,
REMARK2,
REMARK3,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{date,jdbcType=DATE},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{indexType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{indexValue,jdbcType=REAL},
#{mom,jdbcType=REAL},
#{yoy,jdbcType=REAL},
#{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rankInCountry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rankInProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rankInCity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ramark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tb_sta_total
DATE = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDEX_TYPE = #{indexType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDEX_VALUE = #{indexValue,jdbcType=REAL},
MOM = #{mom,jdbcType=REAL},
YOY = #{yoy,jdbcType=REAL},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANK_IN_COUNTRY = #{rankInCountry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RANK_IN_PROVINCE = #{rankInProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RANK_IN_CITY = #{rankInCity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RAMARK1 = #{ramark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select sum(index_value) total,year,month from tb_sta_total where year = year(now()) and month = month(now())
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{volumeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
UNION select sum(index_value) total,year,month from tb_sta_total where year = year(now()) and month = month(now())-1
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{volumeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
UNION select sum(index_value) total,year,month from tb_sta_total where year = year(now()) and month = month(now())
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{countType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
UNION select sum(index_value) total,year,month from tb_sta_total where year = year(now()) and month = month(now())-1
AND INDEX_TYPE like CONCAT('%',#{countType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
